description: MainActivity.kt defines the main UI activity for a minimalistic two-player Tic Tac Toe game on Android. It manages game state, user interactions, UI updates, and onboarding dialog.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity hosting the Tic Tac Toe game, managing UI elements, game logic, state restoration, and onboarding dialog.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI, restores state if available, or shows onboarding.

methods.name: setupBoardButtons
methods.description: Configures click listeners and styles for each cell button in the game grid.

methods.name: styleCell
methods.description: Applies visual styles to individual cell buttons.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on cells, updates game state, checks for winner, and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status text to indicate current player's turn if game is ongoing.

methods.name: newRound
methods.description: Resets the game state for a new round.

methods.name: fullReset
methods.description: Resets the entire game, currently same as newRound.

methods.name: syncBoardUI
methods.description: Synchronizes UI with current game board state.

methods.name: clearHighlights
methods.description: Removes visual highlights from board cells.

methods.name: highlightWin
methods.description: Highlights the cells that form the winning line.

methods.name: winningLines
methods.description: Returns all possible winning line combinations.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks whether there is a winner and returns 'X' or 'O' accordingly.

methods.name: showOnboarding
methods.description: Displays onboarding dialog with instructions for first launch.

methods.name: onSaveInstanceState
methods.description: Saves current game state to bundle for activity restoration.

methods.name: restoreState
methods.description: Restores game state from saved bundle during activity recreation.
